articles.title: Welcome!
articles.contents:
Thomas Fullagar
      
      
      Home
      About
      290
      ☰
      
      
      
        
          
            
          
            Welcome!
          
          
            
          
          
            My name is Thomas Fullagar (“Full-uh-gar”). I am currently in the PhD Economics program at University of California Santa Barbara (UCSB). My research interests are in applied micro-economics fields. My general areas of interest are education and crime, with focuses on higher education and judicial sentencing practices. In my spare time I enjoy playing soccer, reading, and taking walks on the beach with Mocha.
